projects.projectDescription: This is an application which is mainly designed to cover vehicle insurance process online. The domain of this project is HR. This application is built for 3 platforms â€“ 1. Web 2. Android 3. iOS I am responsible for development of web platform. This application is built in angular. This application is used by 2 kinds of person, or this application have 2 modes â€“ 1. Insured 2. Inspector Insured: The person who is owner of damage vehicle. He must upload photo of damage vehicle then we sent image of vehicle to Python API for AI Processing to detect actual damage. And then he needs to fill different information about vehicle like VIN number, Odometer reading etc at last user need to sign the form through digital signature to claim insurance Inspector: This is a person who is authorized person from insurance company. And from this mode he can claim insurance for multiple customers with same process mention above.
